name: Dam Defense
description: Your home is under attack and you are the only one that can defend it! The dam is the last line of defense and the only thing keeping the attackers out! Ready your trusty cannon, ignite the flamethrowers and take command of the bird army as you take down waves of enemy battleships and shoot for a high score in this defence based, first person shooter! Do you have what it takes to defend your home and master the art of the cannon?
